title: Coconut Curry Pumpkin Soup
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons coconut oil', '1 large onion, chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', '750ml vegetable stock', '425g diced fresh pumpkin', '1 teaspoon curry powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon ground coriander', '1/4 teaspoon crushed dried chilli flakes', '250ml light coconut milk']
